Those big screen iPhones are enticing iPad users after all, Compare My Mobile's trade-in data shows
articles.Description: Apparently, 12% of iPad owners (pre-2014 models) have traded in their tablet for a new iPhone 6, while 8% gave up their beloved fondleslabs for the bigger iPhone 6 Plus. Although these numbers hardly indicate that big-screen phones are putting the iPad's gig in jeopardy, it seems an appropriately plump-screened phone does provide an adequate tablet replacement for a considerable excerpt of users. If this tendency spikes further down the iPhone and iPad's future, Apple might consider...
